main_definition: Injury refers to any harm or damage caused to a person's body, often resulting from accidents or physical trauma.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Physical harm or damage to the body.
meanings_and_examples.example: The injury he sustained after falling off his bike required immediate medical attention.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A setback or negative impact on a person's well-being, not necessarily physical in nature.
meanings_and_examples.example: She faced emotional injury when her close friend betrayed her trust.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In sports and games, an injury refers to harm suffered by a player or participant which affects their ability to continue the game or compete fairly.
meanings_and_examples.example: The soccer match was paused due to injuries sustained by two of the players.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An injustice or wrong committed against someone, metaphorically causing harm to a person's dignity or rights.
meanings_and_examples.example: She experienced emotional injury when she was unfairly criticized at work.
